page.title: 16LOCAL AMIENITIES
page.content: The only residential centre of any size in this block is the Village of Uffculme and it is here that all amienities are centred. These generally take place in the public buildings which have been described elsewhere in this account. There are a wealth of activities in the area and these include: Scouts, Cubs, Guides, Brownies, Army Cadets, Bible Club, Youth Club, Badminton Club, Bowling Club, Cricket Club, Culm United Football Club, British Legion, Over Sixties, Womens Institute, Men's Club, Gardeners' Assn., Twinning Assn., Dramatic Assn., Local History Group, Gingerbread Group. There are also a number of charitable and political organisations which one can join. These societies meet in one of several public meeting places in the village or in the Primary or Secondary School.
